name: NEONARCADE: adventure puzzle muse
description:
NEON ARCADE: adventure puzzle quest - a game in which you have to go through many levels, overcoming various puzzles and obstacles. You will enjoy nice graphics, sound and unforgettable gameplay!
Features:
  • Unusual electro soundtrack!
  • Various levels and their complicated versions!
  • Art with an unusual and beautiful style!
  • Steam achievements!
Credits: This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5! Music by OnericOzelot!
